      protected EV3DevSensorDevice(java.lang.String portName, java.lang.String mode, java.lang.String device)

    • Constructor Detail

      • EV3DevSensorDevice

        protected EV3DevSensorDevice(java.lang.String portName,
                             java.lang.String mode,
                             java.lang.String device)
        Every device connected in a EV3 Brick with EV3Dev appears in /sys/class in a determinated category. It is necessary to indicate the type and ports.
        Parameters:
        portName - The ports where is connected the sensors or the actuators.
        mode - mode
        device - device
